text: This is a common user error: there are two methods named getInitParameter().The ServletContext init parameters are set as context-param in web.xmlas <context-param><param-name>...</param-name><param-value>...</param-value>The per-Servlet init parameters are set in web.xml as<servlet>...<init-param><param-name>...</param-name><param-value>...</param-value></servlet>.
